column2: "Confirmed elimination of enemy vanguard! ...But I'm reading large numbers above you!"
"Tch, they're sending even more? Stubborn bastards!"
"Phaleg has told me everything! Leave the extermination of these foolish invaders to me!"
"Diploma?! We're busy here, get lost!"
"You're as pleasant as ever, my younger friend! But will you remain unswayed after witnessing this!"
"Come forth! Emerald Tablet...2!"
"A massive Phantom has appeared! It's surfacing...! This is ridiculous!"
"Why the surprise! It is my Yamato! This sort of entrance is only natural!"
"Cut the crap!"
"Isn't that that weapon of his that went berserk...?"
"He's calling it \"2\", so he must have made a new one somehow..."
"I guess even completely insane people can actually do something respectable once in a while..."
"Way to call the kettle black."
"Shut up!"
"Main cannons, secondary battery! Take aim...! Fiiiiiire!"
"It's...a little extreme, but this should even the playing field a bit!"
"Exactly. Quantity is key here. Their motive is unimportant. Any useful piece should be used."

"Leave this place to us. <%me>.
You may return to your own mission."
"I surmise it is one that does not require you to be here."
"Phaleg is right. We'll handle things here somehow."
"The enemies have to be coming from somewhere, don't they? Taking their source out is your job."
"It might not mean much, since you've already had to save us once... But leave this to us."
"Besides, we've got people here who once took down a god."
"Be pretty embarrassing if they couldn't even beat riffraff like this."

"My brother is right. <%me>.
We'll protect the Earth."
"We may not be as strong as you, but everyone is working together... So you do your best too!"
